source_text: A 2.5% net smelter return royalty on standard terms.
additional_details: Royalty is part of the consideration for the acquisition of exploration licences (EL8830, EL8831, EL7242 and EL9711) by Adavale Resources Limited (ADD) from Agricultural Equity Investments Pty Ltd (AEI). AEI receives the royalty from ADD.
